Yes he needs to visit politically but we don't need to validate him with pomp and ceremony. His behaviour is already harming vulnerable ppl.
For a variety of reasons I haven't gone to the #TrumpBan protest in Edinburgh today, but I wish I had. He shouldn't be given a state visit.
(I was going to use the word bigot there, but suspect that applies to too many in Westminster also)
I am disgusted that our PM would hold hands with Trump rather than hold him to account. I am disgusted that our gov. validates a fascist.
